alert.note: Alert for Bell; Coryell; Lampasas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 5:28PM CDT until March 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coryell County in central Texas... Southeastern Lampasas County in central Texas... Northwestern Bell County in central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Lampasas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Killeen, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Gatesville, Lampasas, Fort Hood, Kempner, Fort Gates, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, South Mountain, Izoro, Rumley, Adamsville, King, Topsey and Pidcoke. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
